skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mrs. meyer's
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Mrs. Meyer’s Soy Tin Candles come in a range of garden-inspired scents.

And oh my, do they ever smell good! The tough part is knowing which fragrance to choose. Will it be refreshing Lemon Verbena or charming Honeysuckle? Cool Basil or floral Lavender? Well, we’ve got someone to help you: Mrs. Meyer's skill for Amazon Alexa, of course.

Yes, we know she can't light a candle …but she can help when it comes to choosing one. All you have to do is ask: Alexa! Ask Mrs. Meyer's how does the Honeysuckle smell? And she will have the answer for you. Once you’ve decided which scent suits your mood, add the candle to your list!

This skill uses Amazon Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Amazon Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Amazon Alexa app.
